Summary: Taking pics of fire and found alien in mirror reflection
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving north to a retail store on the north end of Colorado Springs CO. Taking pictures of the Black Forest Fires. Roughly six hours later I was going to post pictures on FaceBook and noticed a grey alien in my rear view mirror. Could be a reflection of anything but it looks too much like an alien. For several nights, my wife and I have been hearing sounds and what seems to be foot steps on our roof at night.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Pueblo
There were no other sightings in Pueblo on or around June 11th 2013
